title: 1.3.2厨房mod ssp
author: trumanpan
txt_content:
本帖最后由 trumanpan 于 2012-10-15 16:45 编辑 

                         开饭了！！！厨房mod
               

v.1.6.8
Finally SMP.
Slightly modified texture.
Edited code.
Turn to the plans:
Increase the number of textures, ie remove their limit.
Fixed boxes.
Everything else is a secret).





blocks:
Box.
Box with bamboo.
Box with 2 handles in the middle.
A box with handles on the left and right sides.
A box with a handle on the left side.
The box with the glass and the handle.
Food (restores HP, and hunger):
Stuffing +1 HP.
Sweet "Zheleyka" +1 HP.
Buns +1 HP.
Burgers +3 HP.
Pan.
Pan filled.
Casserole with soup +6 HP.
Cheese +5 HP.
Fried egg +1 HP.
Fried chicken legs +2 HP.
Flour.
Pancake +4 HP.
A large bottle.
Slurry.
Moonshine. +8 HP.
Salo. (no use)
Hops.
Minced chicken. (of not in the future updates will be much good)
Minced pork. (also)
Ground beef. (also)
Yum.
Wrapper of the candy. (You can use the money!)
Now the burger of beef and pork =)
Beer. +8 HP.


不会翻译的插

————————————————分割线—————————————
合成表
合成表在这


盒子



熊猫哥专用（自己猜是什么）




这是pizza pizza

猜猜猜？猜不出，不瞒你说，这是盐矿石。

啤酒

啤酒杯

满满的一杯啤酒

酒花


被剁碎的肌肉


被剁碎的牛肉

其实还有很多很多的东西，自己去官网慢慢看吧！

          server为多人
把这两个文件夹里的东西放进 minecraft .jar
当然按你自己的需要。
欢迎向我提出意见，我会改进的。[leather]
